author: Morgan Sung
title: Band creates a trippy music video using Zoom
description: Artists are still shooting music videos — they're just over Zoom now. Thao & The Get Down Stay Down, a band based in California, which has a statewide stay at home order, filmed the video for their song "Phenom" over the video conferencing software. It starts…
content:
Artists are still shooting music videos they're just over Zoom now. 
Thao & The Get Down Stay Down, a band based in California, which has a statewide stay at home order, filmed the video for their song "Phenom" over the video conferencing software. It st… [+458 chars]
